sentence: But also putting up a strong fight for the nomination are attorney Morgan Harper, a progressive who challenged Rep. Joyce Beatty to represent the Columbus area in 2020; and Traci Johnson, a longtime state employee who is now a tech executive.
author: Kayla Epstein
title: These 9 Senate races hold the key to who will control Joe Biden's agenda after the midterm elections in November

author: Via AP news wire
title: Campaigns weigh strategy options if Ohio primary is delayed

author: Julie Carr Smyth and Jill Colvin
